alert.note: Alert for Bryan; Chatham (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued August 30 at 10:27AM EDT until August 30 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston has issued a * Tornado Warning for portions of... Bryan County in southeastern Georgia... Chatham County in southeastern Georgia... * Until 1100 AM EDT. * At 1027 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Keller, moving northwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include: Pooler, Richmond Hill, Fort Mcallister, Keller, Belfast, and Burroughs. This warning includes I-95 in Georgia between mile markers 84 and 99. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: Tornadoes from tropical storms or hurricanes can form and move very quickly. TAKE COVER IMMEDIATELY! If you wait until you hear a tornado it could be too late. Take action now to immediately protect yourself.
